titleStmt.title: [The city-law, or, the course and practice in all manner of juridicall proceedings in the hustings in Guild-Hall, London]

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Alsop, for L. Chapman, and L. Blaiklocke, and are to be sold at their shops, at Temple-Barre, and at the next doore to the Fountaine Taverne in the Strand,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: lacks title page and prelims, and has considerable print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the next doore to the Fountaine Taverne in the Strand
